ValidationRule.description: Checks to ensure the resolution field is populated when case is closing.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && (AND($RecordType.Name ='FalconConnect', OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Propose to Close')), ISBLANK(Resolution__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Resolution field information. Case cannot be closed if Resolution field is blank.
